divs: Sighting Detailscondado, Puerto rico at 4:39 am i saw two circular orange lights. the first one pass from east to west a very low speed and then disappear at the same time i saw a airplane towards san juan but far away( the pilots must have seen the lights). then the second one appears in the same spot the the first one appears for the first time. the second make the same exact path that the first one make (like the exact replay) of the first. this video is from the second one. They do not make any sound, the inside of the circle is like more fire color and the exterior is more orange red color. Note: the ufo appears at he first of the video a very tiny point.. the light at the left is a light pole
Summary: round yellow- arange ball like fire move from east to west
trends: There have been no other sightings in San Juan
This sighting has never been favorited.
